all_text_visible_in_thumbnail: प्रेग्नेंट होने के लिए सेक्स के बाद कितनी देर तक लेटे रहना चाहिए ?

THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.reinforcement: The thumbnail visually matches the title by clearly presenting a medical doctor (Dr. Supriya Puranik), who is the expert featured in both title and thumbnail. The text in the thumbnail is nearly identical to the full video title, directly reflecting the spoken question that will be addressed.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.contrasts_or_mismatches: There is strong alignment; no significant mismatch. The professional, clean design and presence of an actual expert in the thumbnail reinforce the trustworthiness promised by the title.
